name: ELAKHA ALLIANCE
sampleDescriptions: Assessing the scientific and economic feasibility of sea otter restoration, and, if warranted, proceed with a restoration in carefully chosen suitable places along the Oregon coast.
Assessing the scientific and economic feasibility of sea otter restoration, and, if warranted, proceed with a restoration in carefully chosen suitable places along the Oregon coast.
General background education on laws and regulations affecting potential sea otter reintroduction.
